groups.description: A list of groups (group names or group UUID) that are exempt from this branch restriction. Can only be set if restriction type (`kind`) is set to `push` or `restrict_merges`.

id.description: The ID of the branch restriction.

kind.description: The type of restriction to apply.

pattern.description: The pattern to match against branches this restriction will apply to.

repository.description: The name of the repository (must consist of only lowercase ASCII letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens).

users.description: A list of users (usernames or user's UUID) that are exempt from this branch restriction. Can only be set if restriction type (`kind`) is set to `push` or `restrict_merges`.

value.description: A configurable value used by the following restrictions: `require_passing_builds_to_merge` uses it to define the number of minimum number of passing builds, `require_approvals_to_merge` uses it to define the minimum number of approvals before the PR can be merged, `require_default_reviewer_approvals_to_merge` uses it to define the minimum number of approvals from default reviewers before the PR can be merged.

workspace.description: The slug or UUID (including the enclosing `{}`) of the workspace.

id.description: The ID of the default reviewer.

repository.description: The name of the repository (must consist of only lowercase ASCII letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens).

workspace.description: The slug or UUID (including the enclosing `{}`) of the workspace.

id.description: The ID of the deploy key.

key.description: The public SSH key to attach to this deploy key.

label.description: The label of the deploy key.

repository.description: The name of the repository (must consist of only lowercase ASCII letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens).

workspace.description: The slug or UUID (including the enclosing `{}`) of the workspace.

is_private.description: A boolean to state if the project is private or not.

workspace.description: The slug or UUID (including the enclosing `{}`) of the workspace the project belongs to.

fork_policy.description: The name of the fork policy to apply to this repository.

is_private.description: A boolean to state if the repository is private or not.

name.description: The name of the repository (must consist of only lowercase ASCII letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens).

project_key.description: The key of the project this repository belongs to.

workspace.description: The slug or UUID (including the enclosing `{}`) of the workspace this repository belongs to.

events.description: A list of events that will trigger the webhook - see docs for a complete list.

is_active.description: A boolean to state if the webhook is active or not.

repository.description: The name of the repository (must consist of only lowercase ASCII letters, numbers, underscores and hyphens).

url.description: The url to configure the webhook with.

workspace.description: The slug or UUID (including the enclosing `{}`) of the workspace this webhook belongs to.
